Hire Me

About

My name is Patrícia Feio and I just finished a one year Web Design course in Lisbon School of Design. I'm passionate about front-end development and I'm currently seeking an opportunity where I can develop my skills and learn from others.

When I decided to make a career change, I wanted something challenging and creative in the tech field. During my Web Design course I discovered the magic world of web development, in particular front-end development. I'm interested in responsive front-end development with special attention for a mobile first approach.

I'm curious and I have a true desire to learn.
